channel.title: Need help...please help
channel.description:
How do i fix this. everytime i do a scipt this happens.
Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 3.06\includes\SI.SCAR does not exist. Failed when compiling

item.title: Need help...please help
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

Also, SI.Scar is an outdated include. If you use a script with that include, the script is outdated aswell. So you better get a newer script.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help...please help
item.dc:creator: @IP-Drowner IP-Drowner
item.description:
@IP-Drowner wrote:

[quote=“thecoolgu2, post:1, topic:122226”]How do i fix this. everytime i do a scipt this happens.

Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 3.06\includes\SI.SCAR does not exist.
Failed when compiling[/quote]
Go to File> Download Includes.

Read full topic
